column2: to=The Vice Chancellor of [[University of Leeds
subject=Announcing his election to the [[Rawlinson and Bosworth Professor of Anglo-Saxon

column1: Tolkien informed the Vice Chancellor that he had been elected (see [[Letter 7]]) to the [[Rawlinson and Bosworth Professor of Anglo-Saxon
column2: Rawlinson and Bosworth professorship]] at [[Oxford University
column3: Oxford]], and therefore was tendering his resignation.  He apologised for the brevity of his appointment at Leeds, where he had only been working five years.
